definition: to nip (i.e. cut short)/to pinch off
Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: FOX caught in a trap escaped, but in so doing lost his tail.
sentences.chinese: 一隻狐狸被捕獸器把尾巴夾斷了。

sentences.english: These bilayers then pinch off to form enclosed vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 這些磷脂雙分子層夾斷後形成封閉的細胞。

sentences.english: A FOX caught in a trap escaped, but in so doing lost his tail.
sentences.chinese: 一隻狐狸被捕獸器把尾巴夾斷了。
